entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Buchans
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:19 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Millertown 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
Temperature: -21.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: SSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 27 February 2023
